title: Drawing, "Washington Irving's Library at Sunnyside", March 16, 1860
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower margin: W Irvings Library / Library Sunny- side -March 16/60; at upper left: His/slouched/grey hat &/dark coat/panel- ling of/room/birds eye maple; at right margin: Geo Joshua & friends/sugary-frome/2/watercolors/of Palm/scene in knickerbocker/(....)/maple frames/giltedges/mantle/mecrier blk/marble/grate/2 bronze two branches/ candlesticks with/candles

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Washington Irving's Library at Sunnyside", March 16, 1860.
March 16, 1860. Graphite
Support: Gray/Beige Wove Paper. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1942-50-158.
